blink.execute_now: Would you like to set this pattern now?
blink.when_blink_leds: When would you like to make the device LEDs blink?

commands.success: Command submitted successfully, you can look at the Commands log for the result
commands.title: Command History

common.execute_now: Would you like to execute this command now?

configure.choose_file: You need to choose a valid .json file:
configure.title: Configure
configure.valid_json: You need to enter valid JSON

delete_command.explanation: Are you sure you want to delete this command? This action is not reversible.
delete_command.title: Delete Command

delete_logs.date: Select the date of the oldest log you would like to keep
delete_logs.explanation: This will delete all of the {{object}} before the date you choose. Be careful, this action is not reversible.

factory_reset.title: Factory Reset
factory_reset.warning: Warning: Once you submit this cannot be reverted

login.login_error: Login error, confirm that your username, password and gateway url are valid

reboot.directions: When would you like to reboot this device?
reboot.now: Would you like to reboot this device now?
reboot.title: Reboot

scan.directions: Launch a wifi scan of this device, which should take approximately 25 seconds.
scan.result_directions: Please click the '$t(scan.re_scan)' button if you would like to do a scan with the same configuration as the last.
scan.waiting_directions: Please wait for the scan result. This may take up to 25 seconds. You can exit and look at the results from the commands table later.

trace.directions: Launch a remote trace of this device for either a specific duration or a number of packets
trace.title: Trace
trace.wait_for_file: Would you like to wait until the trace file is ready?
trace.waiting_directions: Please wait for the trace data file. This may take some time. You can exit the wait and retrieve the trace file from the commands table later.

upgrade.directions: Choose a time and a firmware version for this device
upgrade.offline_device: This option is blocked because this device is not connected
upgrade.title: Firmware Upgrade
upgrade.wait_for_upgrade: Would you like to wait for the upgrade to finish?
